scope.title: Long Stayer Risk Stratification Baseline Models
scope.summary: Baseline machine learning models using historical data from Gloucestershire Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust to predict how long a patient will stay in hospital upon admission.

meta.summary: Baseline machine learning models using historical data from Gloucestershire Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust to predict how long a patient will stay in hospital upon admission.
